00080

00082 
00083             struct GoThreadProc_Params
00084             {
00085                 CPUID *cpuid_class;
00086                 int processor;
00087             };
00088 
00089             static DWORD CALLBACK s_GoThreadProc ( LPVOID lpParameter )
00090             {
00091                 return ( ( GoThreadProc_Params * ) lpParameter )->cpuid_class->
00092                     GoThread ( ( LPVOID * ) &
00093                                ( ( GoThreadProc_Params * ) lpParameter )->processor );
00094             };
00095             DWORD WINAPI GoThread ( LPVOID * params );
00096         #else
00097             long int GoThread ( int processor );
00098         #endif
00099 
00100             void AddCacheDescription ( int processor, const char *description );
